Bullywugs

Factions

Frogfolk group involved in trade, captivity, and shifting alliances through early sessions.

Individuals like Froggertoadman and Kermit create divergent lines within this faction.

See: Session 1 - 2/3/2025, Session 3 - 3/3/2025.
